mehi anitu prathipala dinen dina as panapita diga hareddith eya nothaka hari me rajayada me wana wita 2018 di wyapruthiya nima kirime aramuna athiwa ehi wada katayuthu 78% k dakwa ragenawith thibe. 2008 wasare umaoya wyapruthiya arambaathdi, warimarga wishaya bharawa thibune chamal rajapakshataya. 2007 di maithripala sirisena amathiwaraya atha thibu mema wishaya eelanga kabinat sanshodhanayath samagama ohugen galawa chamalta bharadima osse thamanta me sambandhawa nagena chodanawangen nidahas wannata hitapu janadhipathiwarayata kohethma nohakiya.

emenma siya krida anagathaya randa pawathinne oostreliyanu krikat therim kamitu niladharin atha bawa da ohu sandahan kara thibini.kese namuth idiri dina kipaya thula siya jathyanthara krikat diwiya pilibandawa thiranayak ganna bawa pontin prakasha kele ya.me athara ardha awasan purwa wataye di wishmitha lesa nawasilanthayata parajaya wu dakunu aprikanu pile nayaka greham smith sandahan kele dakunu aprikanu pila parajaye alu pisa dama ikmaninma yali nangi sitinu athi bawaya.“meya dakunu aprikanu krikat pilata itha dushkara kalayak.
